Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Among the variety of conjugated polymers that have been studied , poly(p-phenylenevinylene) ( PPV ) , 2 poly(alkylfluorene) ( PF ) , and polythiophene ( PT ) 3 derivatives are typical p - type electron donor materials.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly(p-phenylenevinylene) |
| poly(alkylfluorene) |
| polythiophene |

Explanation:

1. The first material name is "poly(p-phenylenevinylene)" (PPV).
2. The second material name is "poly(alkylfluorene)" (PF).
3. The third material name is "polythiophene" (PT).

These three names are precisely the same as in the original paragraph.
